Class: RFDriver

RFDriver()

new RFDriver()

Properties:
Name Type Description
manifest Object

The manifest for this driver
options Object

The options for this device as configured in the 'rf' property of the driver
logger Logger

The logger instance for this device instance

Methods

getDevice(data) → {RFDevice|null}

Gets a device which matches given payload data object

Parameters:
Name Type Description
data Object

the data object to match with
Returns:

The first Device that matches the given data.

Type
RFDevice | null

getFlowActionsManifest(optionsopt, filterFnopt) → {Array.<Object>}

Generates an Array with Action flow configs from the manifest

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options Object <optional>

The options object

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
onlyForDriver Boolean <optional>

If this function should filter cards to only cards that contain a 'device' argument for this driver, defaults to true.
filterFn function <optional>

An optional filter function that is called for each matching flow config. Should return true to add tot the result or false to filter the flow config.
Returns:

configs An array containing all configs that match given filters

Type
Array.<Object>

An optional filter function that is called for each matching flow config. Should return true to add tot the result or false to filter the flow config.

Type

getFlowManifest(optionsopt, filterFnopt, typesopt) → {Array.<Object>}

Generates an object with flow configs from the manifest

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
options Object <optional>

The options object

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
onlyForDriver Boolean <optional>

If this function should filter cards to only cards that contain a 'device' argument for this driver, defaults to true.
filterFn function <optional>

An optional filter function that is called for each matching flow config. Should return true to add tot the result or false to filter the flow config.
types Array.<String> <optional>

The flow card types that should be returned. Defaults to all types (['triggers, 'conditions', 'actions']).
Returns:

result An object containing an Array for each type with all configs that match given filters

Type
Array.<Object>

initDefaultFlows(skipopt)

Initializes the default flows that are implemented in the RFDriver.

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
skip Array.<String> <optional>

An array of flow id's that should be skipped when loading default flow logic.

onInit()

The onInit method is called when a driver is initialized. Note. when overriding this method make sure you call super.onInit() or use onRFInit() which is called after onInit()

onPair(socket) → {RFDevice}

The pair method that is called when the user opens the pair view of this driver. Note. When overriding this method make sure you call super.onPair(socket)!

Parameters:
Name Type Description
socket Object

The socket connection object to the pair view
Returns:

The instance of the pairDevice

Type
RFDevice
